alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Livingston; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BRIEF PERIOD OF HEAVIER SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA...CATTARAUGUS... ALLEGANY...LIVINGSTON...SOUTHERN ERIE...AND WYOMING COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavier snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 451 PM EDT, snow showers were along a line extending from near Wales Center to near Ashford Hollow to near Falconer and moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Geneseo, Salamanca, Letchworth State Park, Allegany State Park, Springville, Perry, Warsaw, Mount Morris, Ashford, Arcade, Allegany, Franklinville, Rushford, Chaffee, Portageville, Frewsburg, Ashford Hollow, Houghton, East Concord and Varysburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 near exit 7. Interstate 86 between exits 14 and 24, and near exit 27. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Be prepared for roads to quickly become snow covered. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Livingston; Southern Erie; Wyoming
